name: Paradise ( WIP )
description:
Top Down Adventure. Work In progress

Very little time spent on building the game 

Game Includes:

Basic character controls 

Game does not include:

Title Screen

Basic enemy AI

NPC

Controls:

Controller ( recommended )

X - Attack

A - Dash

B - Thing

Y - Spin

Mouse & Keyboard:

WASD - Movement

Space - Dash

Left Click - Attack
